original_title: Dario Argento's Monkey Business: The Making of Phenomena
overview: Five of the main players behind Dario Argento's classic horror shocker Phenomena (1985) sit down to take viewers through this exclusive, epic-sized, 52 minute making of feature documentary. This was compiled and created for the nationwide Arrow UK DVD and Blu Ray release of the film, which hit all British home video stores on March 7th 2011.
title: Dario Argento's Monkey Business: The Making of Phenomena
